review: Weâ€™ve done many escape rooms in the area and this one was great! Very high quality and very friendly staff! We did the Chocolate Factory room and it was a lot of fun!

room_title: Escape room "The Chocolate Factory" by Get a Clue Games in Baltimore
review: My husband and I chose The Chocolate Factory room. We had SO much fun, and got out with just 8 minutes to spare. We can't wait to go back and try our luck at the other rooms. We would recommend this to anyone for a date night! They also do parties and team building for those in the work force.

room_title: Escape room "The Chocolate Factory" by Get a Clue Games in Baltimore
review: Get a Clue Games were so much fun! Dawn is so personable and is so welcoming! She helps you whenever you are in trouble. They are accommodating with children and even babies. I brought my 11-month-old daughter along and she made sure she was comfortable. We had a great time doing the Chocolate Factory even though we didn't escape. I can't wait to go back!!
